label.description: The user interface label. Change this to uniquely identify the task

saxonJar.description: `Path of the installed Saxon jar file

dtd.description: Requests DTD-based validation of the source file and of any files read using the document() function

enableAssertions.description: Enables assertions both at compile time and at run time

expandValues.description: Specifying 'off' suppresses expansion of DTD/Schema fixed or default values

timing.description: Display version and timing information to the standard error output

messageEscaping.description: Set to 'off' to disable escaping of XML characters in xsl:message output (not available in Saxon 11.1+ versions)

parameters.description: The xsl:param values for the XSLT

name.description: The xsl:param name. Namespaced params can be written as {uri}localname

value.description: The xsl:param value. Special leading characters are: '?' (XPath), '!' (xsl:output), '+' (filename): See: http://www.saxonica.com/documentation/index.html#!using-xsl/commandline

features.description: Set a feature defined in the Saxon Configuration interface. See https://www.saxonica.com/documentation11/index.html#!configuration/config-features

name.description: The feature name - the last part of the Configuration name after the '/' char (name may have a uri suffix). E.g. for 'http://saxon.sf.net/feature/parserFeature?uri=' enter  'parserFeature?uri='

value.description: The value for the given feature

classPathEntries.description: Add Java extension libraries to the classpath
